alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 28 at 2:00PM MST until November 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. This includes the locations of Buford, Horse Creek, Vedauwoo and Bordeaux on I-25 and I-80. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and very low visibilities in falling snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
